dmca.title: DMCA Notificaton for shegate.com [ThePlanetAbuse-C3871967V]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2007 1:35 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Notificaton for shegate.com [ThePlanetAbuse-C3871967V]

This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed
important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for
review and applicable action.

Abuse Department
The Planet


=====================
Original Message
=====================

To: staff@shegate.com, proxy28366@1and1-private-registration.com,
abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notificaton for shegate.com
From: dmca@turn-k.net

with any abuse report

FILETIME=[A757A870:01C7846D]

====== Please reply above this line ======

Hello,

We would like to file a DMCA notification for shegate.com, which is
being hosted on your servers.

You can view the complete DMCA notification here:
HTML format - http://dmca.turn-k.net/9XL-1HHH/html
PDF format - http://dmca.turn-k.net/9XL-1HHH/pdf

The progress of this case is being tracked in this page:
http://dmca.turn-k.net/9XL-1HHH

We are looking forward to hear from you soon.

Best regards,
Rinalds Uzkalns
director
UAB "Integry Systems" / turn-k.net subdivision
http://turn-k.net
